SO in my spare time I made a tank and this is the outcome....

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Tell me what I could do to make it better or if you like it.
May I ask what makes that thing stealthy? I don't know about other people, but I am sure that I'd be able to notice that thing coming my way. However, great looking vehicle and transport!

May I ask what makes that thing stealthy? I don't know about other people, but I am sure that I'd be able to notice that thing coming my way. However, great looking vehicle and transport!

Well....ummm.... you just have to look at it, you know, good enough.
